mapper.select: /* ResveReqstDao.isThereResveNow */ SELECT CASE WHEN IFNULL(count(*),0) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM TB_FCL_APLY_RSVTDE A INNER JOIN TB_FCL_SPCE_APLY B ON A.APLYID = B.APLYID WHERE 1=1 AND B.APLY_STTS_CD IN ('160101','160102') AND B.APLYID != #{aplyid} AND A.RSVTDEID IN( SELECT A.RSVTDEID FROM TB_FCL_APLY_RSVTDE A WHERE APLYID = #{aplyid} )
